name: dino control
author: youngslorp
notes:
got to kog with dinos this season. actually didnt even plan on doing it with dinos and was just looking for something to do while watching mcs day 2 lmao
most matchups were pretty quick, hazy was a bit of an issue but nothin SRH cant handle.
3 amas seems like a lot but so many times i would open with 3 AMAs and with turn 4 with using 2 and bluffing 1. worked like clock work
